channel.title: [pi] help me please
channel.description:
OK so i have a PI server and client and no matter what i do when i change my ip on client it still wont connect to my server (on vps), i tried a different client didnt work, i tried the moparscape 3.2 client it worked!! but loged in and out, i tired the newer 4.1 mopar client... did not work.... every client except the old mopar client keeps saying error connecting to server
any suggestions on what to do

item.title: [pi] help me please
